name: Frustrated Miner
description:
This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Theme: Only one inventory slot.

Explore the open world, mine for resources and see if you can reach the bottom of the world.

Controls:

Left mouse button: Destroy blocks

Right mouse button: Place blocks / Open containers

E: Open inventory

Q: Drop items

Everything except the music was created by BatoRoy.

Music is from icons8.com/music.
